title: Greetings from an anxious noob
content:
Hello everyone. I don't visit here often, but the few times I've scanned this forum and posted questions, I've been in awe of the expertise here.

I'm a graphic designer and I spend more time on another professional forum that has spoiled me with fast responses to my posts.

May I direct traffic to my query in the Design section? I'm OCD and I'm wearing out the refresh button. If this is bad form, please smack me and I won't do it again. Thank you!
author: teaberry

comments.content: You’re simultaneously cross-posting and bumping. That’s bad form anywhere on the internet.
I'm sorry! If I could remove this post I would. The other forum is much more lax about this sort of thing, so please forgive me. Won't do it again.
